comment.author: 31106386@N05
comment._content: This is the "Tin Can Cathedral"! i thought only one photo ever existed of it, but here is another.

comment.author: 26266017@N00
comment._content: This seems to show a much reduced version of the cathedral. If the year is indeed 1907, then this must be after the tower and some other bits were dismantled. Either that, or this is a few years earlier and shows the church at an early stage.

comment.author: 26266017@N00
comment._content: I have a couple of other shots of it. I think it may have been fairly popular as a tourist attraction during its brief existence.
